name: One Putt Wonder
description:
One Putt Wonder is a mini-golf game where you must defeat every course in just one putt! Your reputation depends on it!

Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019 following the theme 'Only One'. Our game is MINI-GOLF where you only get ONE PUTT.

Tell me about it!

You're not just any mini-golf aficionado; you're the best mini-golfer in the world.

You can beat any course in just one shot… except you sometimes need to fix the course as you go. After all, you only miss because the course is wrong.

Take careful aim, make your putt, but this is only the beginning! Use the WASD keys and the SPACEBAR to manipulate the course and show off your HOLE IN ONE PUTTING SKILLS! Careful, though. Other mini-golfers are here to watch your fine performance; messing with the course too much will make them suspicious!

Controls:

Mouse - Set putt direction, click and drag backwards, then release to putt!

WASD - Tilts the course.

SPACEBAR - Freezes traps in place.

BACKSPACE - Resets the course.

TAB - Opens in-game menu.

Created By:

Chootin, Oscar, P3TE

Chootin & P3TE are Blind Mystics
